sub_title: Vice President Marketing & E-commerce - ROI mindset - Building winning digital teams & future proof e-commerce infrastructure for top brands & businesses.

profile_positions.description:
Overseeing and leading the Global growth of D2C marketing growth & E-commerce strategy in five markets (USA, CA, DE, NL, UK) (Branding, Performance Marketing, Partners, E-Commerce Platform.) Grew monthly D2C revenue by 100% year 1 over a period of 9 month.

- Country and new product launch plans & strategy. 
- Overseeing the implementation of Haygain's new influencer program in addition to overseeing the Equine Champions ambassador program. 
- Growth Strategy
- Digital Transformation
- Budget responsibility
- Digital transformation of Haygain's infrastructure towards data driven E-commerce & performance marketing.
- Trade calendar & Marketing calendar 
- Content Strategy
- Management of 8 FTEs & 3 Agencies (Email, Dev, Performance)
- Full revamp of Haygain's brand guidelines
- Full revamp of Haygain's D2C Performance Marketing Strategy (Search, Display, Youtube, Social)
- Rework of the E-commerce Analytics Framework.
- Implementation of E-Mail Marketing Strategy & Automation from scratch.
profile_positions.title: VP of Marketing & E-commerce
Senior E-commerce Trading & Country Manager France

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the E-commerce trading of the Body & Fit webshops for southern Europe.

Current responsibilities include: 

-Trade calendar & promo planning.
-Balancing the needs to the international business versus local market growth and development to find optimal balance. 
-Launch, growth of new & current markets Webshops (Spain / France / Portugal / Italy / Japan)
-Optimizations of the consumer journey across the websites & responsibility for E-commerce conversion & customer journey, A/B tests, to further KPIS on 5 localized websites, user cases & story submissions. 
-E-commerce merchandising strategy
-Agile project management of operations, campaign launches and web-related projects.
-Pricing
-Interdepartmental cooperation to achieve maximum results (IT road maps / Marketing inputs / Country website KPIs crunching, RFM analysis, etc...)
-Supervising the launch from a commercial perspective of a leading merchandising tool (Fred Hopper)
-The management of a team of 6 FTEs
profile_positions.title: E-Commerce Trading Manager South Europe & Japan

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the E-commerce development and strategy of Body & Fit in France by overseeing the we shop, the trade, merchandising & marketing strategies for a pure E-commerce D2C player in the Sports Nutrition Market leading to +2.1 Million € in 2018 and continued sustainable growth in 2019 (+1 Million €) while insuring high margins. 

Roles and responsibilities:

-Implementing and driving and executing a digital marketing growth strategic plan and insuring it was driven through all areas of the business. 
-Implementation and migration of a local marketing agency from the global one
-Creation and drive of a localized branding approach
-Driving the Market Place strategy through Amazon & CDiscount
-Driving and modifying the trade and promotion's calendar through the years to be effective locally.
-Localization of the site & customer experience.
-Driving of the site development road map for an effective local approach
-Supervision and drive of the local pricing strategy
-Supervision of the migration from a commercial perspective from Magento to Hybris
-Driving the localization and SEO efforts of the French content and product data-base
-Leading a team of 3FTEs
profile_positions.title: E-commerce Trading & Country Manager France

profile_positions.description:
Coordinating and managing B2C digital lead generation operations and strategy with a marketing with a budget over a million euros across multiple international markets for our partner universities. (University of Miami, University of Liverpool, Universida Europea de Madrid, European University Cyprus, Bilgi University of Miami)

Roles & Responsibilities:

-Digital Marketing agency supervision, 
-Overall lead-gen strategy and supervision,
-Operations coordination, 
-Media buy 
-Conversion rate optimization, 
-Lead quality monitoring and optimization from a qualitative and quantitative perspective. 
-Working hand in hand with the sales team to define great processes and lead management and gather lead quality feed back. 
-Branding, 
-Content coordination  
-Marketing automation through Marketo, 
-Affiliates management.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing & Lead Generation Manager (PPC - Affiliates)

profile_positions.description:
A role that involved a mix of content supervision, social media management and social media lead generation through various social channels such as LinkedIn and Facebook for the European University Cyprus and achieving a ROI of over 14 to 1 on social lead generation campaigns. 

Roles & Responsibilities:

-Social Media Lead Generation 
-Editor and content manager for the University of Europe Laureate Digital Magazine. (www.uedigital.com/magazine) supervising the curation and publishing of over 40 articles per month.
-Supervising the publishing of the content through paid social media strategies globally and in international markets.
-Supervising and running multi-lingual social media accounts in 4 countries with multi-lingual teams, content and translators.
-Optimizing and improving the customer journey through social media advertising including re-marketing, innovative ways of using Facebook lead ads and lead nurturing.
-Using social media as a smart marketing tool based on both reach, engagement but also return on investment.
-Optimizing the University of Europe Laureate Digital website in order to increase registrations, lead generation and enrollment and turn prospective students into online education adopters.
profile_positions.title: Social Media & Digital Marketing Specialist - Lead Generation

profile_positions.description:
A versatile web management and business development role in which online sales were increased by over 500% in the French market over a period of 8 month by managing the  French webshops & online campaigns. 

Roles & Responsibilities:

-Business Development: Insuring the sustained growth of online business by multiplying traffic sources and conversion opportunities in order to increase the sales volume of multiple web-shops. 
-Project management: Supervising the launch of multiple web-shops on the French market. 
-Digital Marketing: Implementing SEO and SEM strategies for the French market's multiple websites and insuring profitable return on investment on multiple web campaigns, achieving a return on investment of 1 to 10 over multiple digital marketing streams. Increasing sales from 70k to over 400k over 8 month within the French Market.
-Suppliers sourcing: Finding multiple suppliers in order to increase the amount of product choice within the managed web-shops and adapting the product range to the French market.
profile_positions.title: Head of E-commerce - France

profile_positions.description:
In my role as E-Commerce & Community Manager I have taken charge of the online content strategy of both hotels, by sourcing, creating and posting content on both our websites and social media and monitoring our results through tools such as TweetReach, BrandKarma and SimplyMeasured. I am currently in charge of 10 social media accounts including Facebook, Google +, Instagram, Trip Advisor and Twitter. 

I have also been working hand in hand with the head office in order to coordinate our SEO and SEM efforts.
profile_positions.title: E-commerce & Social Media Manager Hotel Plaza Athénée & Le Meurice

profile_positions.description:
Supervising the work of web agencies during the launch of a new corporate website. The migration involved over 2000 pages of content and three month of management. 

Assisting in the transition from PPC strategies from a web agency to in-house.

Planning and Management of PPC campaigns for various five star properties with a yearly budget over a 100k pounds and ROI of over ten to one.

Planning SEO and Marketing strategies for luxury hotel properties including content sourcing and relationship management with individual five star hotels.

Running day to day operations via a CMS on a website totalling over 80 000 unique visitors per week.

A/B testing and implementation of various improvements in order to improve conversion rates.

profile_positions.description: A 12 weeks mission in order to increase Cyber Impact's market share in the English Speaking market through Market Research, SEM and conversion optimisation.

profile_positions.description: The creation and development of a business trading entity with a university colleague in order to prepare and develop the selling and trading of security services within the UK with the French hardware and service security company GIPS Alternative.

profile_positions.description: A three month placement in a French security SME in order to acquire more expertise in the security industry, and to help prepare one of GIPS's new products for the European market in a collaboration effort between Redlog Fox Ltd (my own limited company) and GIPS

profile_positions.description: A one year internship in a national body promoting entrepreneurship and business creation to students. This was done by organizing various events such as business plan competitions, networking events, business talks and conferences within universities. Tasks involved public relations, marketing of events, event organization, networking with various entrepreneurs in order to find speakers and various management tasks. One of our main achievements during that time period was to get Sir Ian Wood, founder of the Wood group (A major billion dollars oil service company) to give a talk at one of our events.
